Changelog
=========

0.0.3 (Nov 23rd 2015)

### Small Fix

- Stop selecting incorrect shard group.

0.0.2 (Oct 11th, 2015)
------------------

### More Tests and Docs

- Added additional tests and updated docs


0.0.1 (Oct 11th, 2015)
------------------

### New Package

- Added initial functionality to support sharded models, read replicas, tables on non-default databases, docs etc...
